messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The clown is to not be arrested, he is an ambassador of peace

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Russian Outreach Program

Cargo: A group of angry Russians want to have a party. Can you send them your cargo shuttle then make them disappear?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We are watching in the cameras, a team will be sent to rescue the clown if he is not released

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: You have 5 minutes to free the clown before we send in a retrieval team

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Good crew, now be sure to read up on space law before we have to intervene

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Security, I highly reccomend following a doctrine of ask first, shoot later

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Security, you can arrest your fellow officers if they break the law

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unidentified armed ship detected near the station.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Data theft signal detected, source registered on local gps units.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We have reports that you fucksticks let the station go to shit

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: You are all fired, get on the shuttle and report to gulag
